ComicInfo.Summary:
The secret agendas of the people of Prague extend far beyond what Dr. Radek has been doing to keep people safe. But in order to rid the city of the Nazis, safety cannot be guaranteed.
In an attempt to protect the people he cares about, Radek is about to discover that sometime there is more reality in myths than he realized, but it comes with a cost.
